sentence.Network_en: Conclusion: Elsholtzia Cilita essential oil may be used in some concentration range is safe.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论: 香薷精油在一定浓度范围内使用是安全的.

sentence.Network_en: The main ingredient of this kind of medicinal material is extracted from elsholtzia.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种药材的主要成份是从香薷里提取的吧!

sentence.Network_en: Additionally, some of these Elsholtzia species show antibacterial, anti - inflammatory , relieving fever , activities and myocardial ischemia protection.
sentence.Network_cn: 另外, 部分植物还具有抗菌 、 抗炎 、 解热镇痛和心肌缺血保护作用.
